text:
Hello,

I am trying to search for emails using CRM Search API and would like to know if there is any way to search within both subject and body of the email?

Currently, I tried adding both filters in the filter groups, but it's throwing an error called "There was a problem with the request." However, the same API is working if I only have one filter, which is `hs_email_subject`, and it is failing when I add two filters with propertyNames `hs_email_subject` and `hs_email_text`.

Here is the URL and Body -
```POST <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/emails/search>```
```{
  "properties": [
    "hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids",

          "propertyName": "hs_email_subject",
          "operator": "CONTAINS_TOKEN",
          "value": "*body*"

Hi,
I would like to ask about is it any API/SDK allow to get the activities/engagements for specific custom object?
Seem like the API only allow to get a single engagements or get recent engagements without specific it under which object record.
Hi people, has anyone seen this error before when using the API request to <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/search> failed, reason: unable to get local issuer certificate

I think you're understanding it fine.  I would say actually try it out and see if you get the results you're looking for or not.  You can set it up in the docs page if you want.  I did this to see the code they write (below).  It is very tedious to set up there and run imo but it can be done.  Bottom line -- try it and see what you get.

Developer apps are apps you create inside of a developer account and use Oauth.  Private apps are created in a HubSpot portal and are intended for only that portal and you set up your scopes and get an access token just for that portal - private apps cannot be submitted to the marketplace.  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/get-started>  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/private-apps>

I already did this through postman and it worked. I just wanted to be sure that the Search API is limited for technicaly up to 3 AND filters and if u wish to do an OR it can only be done in the filter group level.

Therefore, you can't compose complicated queries easily and every query should be simplified to have OR in the root level of a query.
meaning "(x > 1 OR y < 7) AND z  !=  null" must be written to the API as "(x > 1 AND z != null) OR (y < 7 AND z  != null)"
<@UD53A9UUR> do you have more information for me here? Thanks!

Hi All
I need to upload files to a custom file type property in the Contact object. In the updated process, we must upload the file directly to this property. Previously, we uploaded files to HubSpot files, but now we need to upload files directly to the specific property on the object. Is there a way to upload files directly to the custom file property on the Contact object using APIs, as shown in the screenshot below?

Hey yall, I am having trouble understanding how to book instances of an existing meeting for contacts via the api.  I am using this endpoint:  /crm/v3/objects/meetings.  I know the ownerID of the team member who runs the meeting, and I know the contactâs unique ID.  Does the âCreate a meetingâ section of this page tell me how to book a new meeting between the contact and the team member?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/meetings>

Or do I book a new meeting simply by adding an association somewhere?  Sorry I am new to the API so any basic outline of what I need would help.  It doesnât seem like I am using the correct endpointâ¦
> Yes â the new API matches whatâs possible in the workflows tool. So if you can create/read the flow in workflows, you will be able to create/read it in the new API.

Hello !
After looking on our side we are not using HubSpot forms in our website for user creation. For that reason we are creating the contact manually from our backend on user subscription.
As we still have the pixel on our website is there a way for us to transmit the GCLID to HubSpot via the Pixel without using an HubSpot form ?
If not is it possible to do it from our backend when sending the conversion to HubSpot and again without using HubSpot forms ?
Thanks in advance for your answer,

Hello everyone,

Stuck on this *HubSpot Import API* error that's been puzzling me. The file is a valid spreadsheet, meets all the requirements and importing using HubSpot Import Tool works without any errors. Does anyone have any ideas on what's going on?

```{"message":"This file isn't a valid Excel spreadsheet","code":"INVALID_SPREADSHEET_FORMAT","context":{"exceptionMessage":["Cannot invoke \"String.getBytes(java.nio.charset.Charset)\" because \"str\" is null"]}} ```
You may want to check out the <#C06TXAQ1LDV|graphql> channel to see if that search tool is more what you need for advanced searches - I have not used it yet
